title: App crashes in ExploreListRootFragment
body:
**Summary:** 

On clicking the last image in **ExploreListRootFragment** the app crashes with **IndexOutOfBoundsException**

**Steps to reproduce:** 

• Go to Explore tab from Bottom Navigation Bar.
• Clicking on the last image in Featured tab causes the app to crash.

**System logs:**

> 2021-02-12 13:11:00.128 26125-26125/fr.free.nrw.commons.beta E/AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: main
    Process: fr.free.nrw.commons.beta, PID: 26125
    java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 10, Size: 10
        at androidx.paging.PagedStorage.get(PagedStorage.java:138)
        at androidx.paging.PagedList.get(PagedList.java:410)
        at fr.free.nrw.commons.explore.media.PageableMediaFragment.getMediaAtPosition(PageableMediaFragment.kt:49)
        at fr.free.nrw.commons.explore.ExploreListRootFragment.getMediaAtPosition(ExploreListRootFragment.java:127)
        at fr.free.nrw.commons.media.MediaDetailFragment.onResume(MediaDetailFragment.java:293)
        at androidx.fragment.app.Fragment.performResume(Fragment.java:2747)
        at androidx.fragment.app.FragmentStateManager.resume(FragmentStateManager.java:363)
        at androidx.fragment.app.FragmentManager.moveToState(FragmentManager.java:1197)

**Device and Android version:** 
• Device (Redmi Note 7S)
• Android (Android 10)

**Screenshots**

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/65870389/107845041-8d9e1380-6dfe-11eb-897f-c0f3206af66b.mp4



**Would you like to work on the issue?**
I want to work on this issue.
